skill.name: invoice-organizer
skill.description: Automatically organizes invoices and receipts for tax preparation by reading messy files, extracting key information, renaming them consistently, and sorting them into logical folders. Turns hours of manual bookkeeping into minutes of automated organization.
skill.summary: Automatically organizes invoices and receipts for tax preparation by reading messy files, extracting...
skill.author: ComposioHQ

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and behavioral instructions. No executable code, scripts, or network operations are present. All file operations would be performed by Claude's built-in tools, not untrusted code.

content.value_statement: Messy invoice folders create stress during tax season. This skill reads receipts and invoices, extracts key details automatically, renames files consistently, and sorts everything into tax-ready folders.
actual_capabilities: Extracts vendor, date, amount, and description from PDF invoices and image receipts
Renames files to standardized format: YYYY-MM-DD Vendor - Invoice - Description.pdf
Sorts invoices into folders by vendor, category, year, quarter, or tax status
Creates CSV summaries for accountants and accounting software
Handles multiple file formats including PDF, JPG, PNG, and email attachments
Preserves original files while organizing copies
limitations: Cannot access password-protected or encrypted PDF files
Scanned images with poor OCR quality may have extraction errors
Cannot merge multi-page invoices split across separate files automatically
Relies on Claude's built-in file tools for actual file operations

use_cases.title: Tax-ready bookkeeping
use_cases.description: Transform disorganized receipts into structured records for tax deductions and accountant handoff.

use_cases.title: Expense tracking
use_cases.description: Keep monthly expenses organized by category for budgeting and quarterly tax estimates.

use_cases.title: Receipt archive
use_cases.description: Build a searchable history of household purchases organized by year and vendor.

prompt_templates.title: Basic organization
prompt_templates.scenario: Organize a folder of mixed invoices
prompt_templates.prompt: Read all files in this folder, identify invoices and receipts, rename them to YYYY-MM-DD Vendor - Invoice - Description format, and organize them by vendor folder.

prompt_templates.title: Tax preparation
prompt_templates.prompt: Organize these invoices by year and expense category (Software, Office, Travel, Services). Create a CSV summary with Date, Vendor, Amount, and Category columns.

prompt_templates.title: Monthly reconciliation
prompt_templates.prompt: Extract date, vendor, total amount, and description from each receipt. Sort into month folders and create an expense report CSV.

prompt_templates.title: Archive cleanup
prompt_templates.prompt: Scan through multiple years of invoices. Create a year/month/vendor hierarchy. Generate a master index spreadsheet of all documents.

output_examples.input: Organize these invoices for my accountant

best_practices: Keep original files in a separate folder before reorganizing
Review the CSV summary for any extraction errors
Organize monthly rather than annually to catch issues early
anti_patterns: Asking for organization without specifying your preferred folder structure
Skipping the review step for files that could not be fully extracted
Moving original files instead of copying them first

faq.question: What file formats are supported?
faq.answer: PDF invoices, image receipts (JPG, PNG), email attachments, screenshots, and bank statement exports.

faq.question: Can it handle password-protected PDFs?
faq.answer: No. The skill cannot access encrypted or password-protected PDF files.

faq.question: Does it modify my original files?
faq.answer: No. The skill copies files to the new structure, preserving originals in their original location.

faq.question: How are categories determined?
faq.answer: Categories are assigned based on vendor type (e.g., Adobe is Software) or can be customized based on your preferences.

faq.question: What if the skill cannot extract invoice details?
faq.answer: Files with unclear information are flagged for manual review in a separate Needs-Review folder.

faq.question: How is this different from manual file organization?
faq.answer: The skill reads invoice content to extract actual dates and amounts, not just filenames, enabling accurate sorting and searchable summaries.
